class:
Shaman
Reduces your Wrath spell's cast time by 0.1 sec and threat caused by 6%. Reduces your Wrath spell's cast time by 0.2 sec and threat caused by 12%. Reduces your Wrath spell's cast time by 0.3 sec and threat caused by 18%. Reduces your Wrath spell's cast time by 0.4 sec and threat caused by 24%. Reduces your Wrath spell's cast time by 0.5 sec and threat caused by 30%.
While active, any time an enemy strikes the caster they have a 35% chance to become afflicted by Entangling Roots (Rank 1). Only useable outdoors. 1 charge. Lasts 45 sec.
Increases the chance for your Nature's Grasp to entangle an enemy by 15% and increases the damage caused by your Thorns and Entangling Roots spells by 10%. Increases the chance for your Nature's Grasp to entangle an enemy by 30% and increases the damage caused by your Thorns and Entangling Roots spells by 20%. Increases the chance for your Nature's Grasp to entangle an enemy by 45% and increases the damage caused by your Thorns and Entangling Roots spells by 30%. Increases the chance for your Nature's Grasp to entangle an enemy by 65% and increases the damage caused by your Thorns and Entangling Roots spells by 40%.
Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by 2%. Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by 4%. Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by 6%. Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by 8%. Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by 10%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 2%. Reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 4%. Reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 6%. Reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 8%. Reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 10%.
Increases your chance to hit with spells by 1%. Increases your chance to hit with spells by 2%. Increases your chance to hit with spells by 3%. Increases your chance to hit with spells by 4%. Increases your chance to hit with spells by 5%.
All spell criticals grace you with a blessing of nature, reducing the casting time of your next spell by 0.5 sec.
Gives your Moonfire and Starfire spells a a 5% chance to stun the target for 2 sec. Gives your Moonfire and Starfire spells a a 10% chance to stun the target for 2 sec.
Casting Moonfire or Wrath after Starfire grants you Stardust for 12 seconds. This effect can stack up to 10 times. Stardust allows 2% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting. Casting Moonfire or Wrath after Starfire grants you Stardust for 12 seconds. This effect can stack up to 10 times. Stardust allows 5% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting. Casting Moonfire or Wrath after Starfire grants you Stardust for 12 seconds. This effect can stack up to 10 times. Stardust allows 7% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by 20%. Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by 40%. Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by 60%. Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by 80%. Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by 100%.
Increases the range of your Wrath, Entangling Roots, Hibernate, Faerie Fire, Moonfire, Starfire, and Hurricane spells by 10%. Increases the range of your Wrath, Entangling Roots, Hibernate, Faerie Fire, Moonfire, Starfire, and Hurricane spells by 20%.
Reduces your Startfire spell's cast time by 0.1 sec and threat caused by 6%. Reduces your Startfire spell's cast time by 0.2 sec and threat caused by 12%. Reduces your Startfire spell's cast time by 0.3 sec and threat caused by 18%. Reduces your Startfire spell's cast time by 0.4 sec and threat caused by 24%. Reduces your Startfire spell's cast time by 0.5 sec and threat caused by 30%.
Brings the druid's quintessence closer to a more balanced state. Based on your current Health and Mana percentages, restores 800 mana if your Health level is greater, or heals you for 592-708 if your Mana level is greater or equal.
Increases your spell damage by 1% and the critical strike chance of your spells by 1%. Increases your spell damage by 2% and the critical strike chance of your spells by 2%. Increases your spell damage by 3% and the critical strike chance of your spells by 3%. Increases your spell damage by 4% and the critical strike chance of your spells by 4%. Increases your spell damage by 5% and the critical strike chance of your spells by 5%.
Transforms the Druid into Moonkin Form. While in this form the armor contribution from items is increased by 360% and all party members within 30 yards have their spell critical chance increased by 3%. The Moonkin can only cast Balance spells while shapeshifted. The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.
Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 8%. Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 16%. Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 24%. Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 32%. Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 40%.
Increases the Attack Power reduction of your Demoralizing Roar by 8% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite by 3%. Increases the Attack Power reduction of your Demoralizing Roar by 16% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite by 6%. Increases the Attack Power reduction of your Demoralizing Roar by 24% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite by 9%. Increases the Attack Power reduction of your Demoralizing Roar by 32% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite by 12%. Increases the Attack Power reduction of your Demoralizing Roar by 40% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite by 15%.
Increases your movement speed by 5% and chance to dodge by 2% while in Cat Form. Increases your movement speed by 10% and chance to dodge by 4% while in Cat Form. Increases your movement speed by 15% and chance to dodge by 6% while in Cat Form.
Increases the stun duration of your Bash and Pounce abilities by 0.5 sec. Increases the stun duration of your Bash and Pounce abilities by 1 sec.
Increases your Armor contribution from items by 2% and grants the armor bonus of your Bear, Dire Bear or Moonkin Form for 0.5 sec after shifting out of it. Increases your Armor contribution from items by 4% and grants the armor bonus of your Bear, Dire Bear or Moonkin Form for 1 sec after shifting out of it. Increases your Armor contribution from items by 6% and grants the armor bonus of your Bear, Dire Bear or Moonkin Form for 1.5 sec after shifting out of it. Increases your Armor contribution from items by 8% and grants the armor bonus of your Bear, Dire Bear or Moonkin Form for 2 sec after shifting out of it. Increases your Armor contribution from items by 10% and grants the armor bonus of your Bear, Dire Bear or Moonkin Form for 2.5 sec after shifting out of it.
Your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points have a 50% chance to add an additional combo point. Your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points have a 100% chance to add an additional combo point.
Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by 1 Rage or Energy and reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling. Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by 2 Rage or Energy and reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling. Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by 3 Rage or Energy and reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling. Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by 4 Rage or Energy and reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling. Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by 5 Rage or Energy and reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling.
Causes you to charge an enemy, immobilizing and interrupting any spell being cast for 4 sec.
Gives you a 50% chance to gain an additional 5 Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear and Dire Bear Form. Gives you a 100% chance to gain an additional 5 Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear and Dire Bear Form.
Increases your energy regeneration by 3% every 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 30%, while in combat in Cat Form. Increases your energy regeneration by 6% every 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 30%, while in combat in Cat Form. Increases your energy regeneration by 10% every 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 30%, while in combat in Cat Form.
Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, Maul and Swipe abilities by 5%. Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, Maul and Swipe abilities by 10%. Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, Maul and Swipe abilities by 15%. Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, Maul and Swipe abilities by 20%. Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, Maul and Swipe abilities by 25%.
Increases your critical strike chance while in Bear, Dire Bear or Cat Form by 2%. Increases your critical strike chance while in Bear, Dire Bear or Cat Form by 4%. Increases your critical strike chance while in Bear, Dire Bear or Cat Form by 6%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Enrage ability by 10 seconds. Reduces the cooldown of your Enrage ability by 20 seconds.
Decreases the target's armor by 175 and chance to hit by 3% for 40 sec. While affected, the target cannot stealth or turn invisible.
Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks by 1%. In addition, while in Cat Form your Attack Power is increased by 1% for every party member within 45 yards. Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks by 2%. In addition, while in Cat Form your Attack Power is increased by 2% for every party member within 45 yards. Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks by 3%. In addition, while in Cat Form your Attack Power is increased by 3% for every party member within 45 yards. Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks by 4%. In addition, while in Cat Form your Attack Power is increased by 4% for every party member within 45 yards. Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks by 5%. In addition, while in Cat Form your Attack Power is increased by 5% for every party member within 45 yards.
Increases your Strength by 2%. In addition, while in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by 4%. Increases your Strength by 4%. In addition, while in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by 8%. Increases your Strength by 6%. In addition, while in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by 12%. Increases your Strength by 8%. In addition, while in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by 16%. Increases your Strength by 10%. In addition, while in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by 20%.
Gives you immunity to Fear effects while Enrage is active.
Increases ranged and melee critical chance of all party members within 45 yards by 3% while in Cat Form.
Increases your Defense while in Bear or Dire Bear Form by 100% of your level. In addition, your Growl and Challenging Roar abilities grant you 25% damage reduction for 3 seconds.
Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 7%. Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 14%. Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 21%. Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 28%. Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 35%.
Gives you 20% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or 40 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form. Gives you 40% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or 40 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form. Gives you 60% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or 40 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form. Gives you 80% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or 40 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form. Gives you 100% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or 40 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form.
Increases the effectiveness of all healing done to you by 5%. Increases the effectiveness of all healing done to you by 10%.
Allows 10% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting. Allows 20% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting. Allows 30% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Increases all resistances by 3 and the spell penetration of your Nature spells by 2. Increases all resistances by 6 and the spell penetration of your Nature spells by 4. Increases all resistances by 9 and the spell penetration of your Nature spells by 6. Increases all resistances by 12 and the spell penetration of your Nature spells by 8. Increases all resistances by 15 and the spell penetration of your Nature spells by 10.
Reduces the cooldown of your Rebirth spell by 5 minutes and increases the amount of health and mana restored to the target by 10%. Reduces the cooldown of your Rebirth spell by 10 minutes and increases the amount of health and mana restored to the target by 20%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Rejuvenation spell by 5%. Reduces the mana cost of your Rejuvenation spell by 10%. Reduces the mana cost of your Rejuvenation spell by 15%.
Consumes a Rejuvenation or Regrowth effect on a friendly target to instantly heal them an amount equal to 12 sec. of Rejuvenation or 18 sec. of Regrowth.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 10%. Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 20%. Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 30%. Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 40%. Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 50%.
Reduces the threat caused by your healing spells by 15%. In addition, reduces your Tranquility and Hurricane spells' mana cost and threat caused by 30%. Reduces the threat caused by your healing spells by 30%. In addition, reduces your Tranquility and Hurricane spells' mana cost and threat caused by 60%.
Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by 0.1 sec. Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by 0.2 sec. Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by 0.3 sec. Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by 0.4 sec. Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by 0.5 sec.
Increases your total stats by 1% and the effect of all healing spells by 2%. Increases your total stats by 2% and the effect of all healing spells by 4%. Increases your total stats by 3% and the effect of all healing spells by 6%. Increases your total stats by 4% and the effect of all healing spells by 8%. Increases your total stats by 5% and the effect of all healing spells by 10%.
When activated, your next Nature spell becomes an instant cast spell.
Increases your Spirit by 3%. Increases your Spirit by 6%. Increases your Spirit by 9%. Increases your Spirit by 12%. Increases your Spirit by 15%.
Increases the damage and healing done by your Nature spells by up to 20% of your Spirit.
